thread.title: Leftover cash? Ex-lawmakers find plenty of use for money

title: Leftover cash? Ex-lawmakers find plenty of use for money
text: > Top News Leftover cash? Ex-lawmakers find plenty of use for money FILE- In this Dec. 20, 2010 file photo, Sen. Evan Bayh speaks at Fort Wayne International Airport, Fort Wayne, Ind. Members of Congress can pretty much do whatever they want with leftover campaign cash when they leave office except use it for personal expenses. Former Indiana Sen. Evan Bayh has kept $10 million in campaign contributions for the last five years, leaving people wondering whether heâ€™ll use it to return to politics. (Samuel Hoffman/The Journal Gazette, File)
